issue.title: [R] Unable to install dev version of arrow: Unable to identify current OS/version
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17314](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17314). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*
